price: 14. Tous n’avaient fait que traiter les Messagers de menteurs, et (tous) avaient mérité Mon châtiment.
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
